description: This file defines a JPA entity class 'UtilityAccountEntity' representing utility account data in the context of a banking application. It maps to the 'banking_core_utility_account' table and includes fields such as 'id', 'number', and 'providerName'.

classes.name: UtilityAccountEntity
classes.description: Entity class representing a utility account with fields for id, number, and provider name, mapped to a specific database table.

methods.name: getter for id
methods.description: Retrieves the unique identifier for the utility account.

methods.name: setter for id
methods.description: Sets the unique identifier for the utility account.
